薻字的基本解释

薻
zǎo
古同“藻”。

薻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǎo］
［《廣韻》子晧切，上晧，精。］
亦作“薻1”。
(1)植物名。指藻类植物。含叶绿素和其他辅助色素的低等植物。
(2)文采。
(3)引申为美好。
(4)华丽的文辞。
(5)修饰。
(6)引申为修养。
(7)品藻。
(8)古代帝王皇冠上系玉的五彩丝绳。
(9)古代官员衣服上所绣作为标志用的水藻图纹。
(10)垫玉的彩色板。

薻字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薻； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1063第10
【集韻】藻本字。【說文】从水巢聲。【五經文字】藻同薻。

薻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
薻字的起名意思

暂无。

Twig
Basic explanation of words
Twig
zǎo
Ancient with "algae".
Twig
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǎo］
["Guangyun" Zi Hao cut, Shang Hao, fine. ]
Also known as "薻1".
(1) Plant name. Refers to algae. Lower plants containing chlorophyll and other auxiliary pigments.
(2) Literary talent.
(3) The extension is beautiful.
(4) Gorgeous words.
(5) Modification.
(6) The extension is self-cultivation.
(7) Product algae.
(8) The colorful silk rope tied with jade on the ancient emperor's crown.
(9) The algae pattern embroidered on the clothes of ancient officials as signs.
(10) Dianyu's colored board.
Twig
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　薻; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1063 No. 10
【Jiyun】The original character of algae. [Said the text] From the water nest sound. 【Five Classics】The algae are the same as those of the alga.
